alert.note: Alert for Cape Girardeau; Perry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 2:36AM CDT until August 05 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jackson County in southern Illinois... Perry County in southeastern Missouri... Northern Cape Girardeau County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 236 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Willisville to 8 miles northwest of Altenburg to 6 miles northeast of Alliance, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chester, Perryville, Murphysboro, Ava, Grand Tower, Altenburg, Frohna, Gorham, Pocahontas, Longtown, Old Appleton, Lithium and Silver Lake. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 113 and 139. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
